message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'opennlp.tools.util.StringList' import. Should be before 'org.junit.Test'.
First sentence of Javadoc is missing an ending period.
Abbreviation in name 'testBigramMLProbability' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'testTrigramMLProbability' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'testNgramMLProbability' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Local variable name 'nGrams' must match pattern '^[a-z]([a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*)?$'.
